name: Exbury Gardens Miniature Railway - the whole line
description:
Check out my Europe by Train Bright Trip guide: https://www.brighttrip.com/europebytrain
A combination of illness and other commitments mean there's no full length trip report this weekend. Sorry! But here's something for the train enthusiasts - a full length ride over the full 1.5 miles on the delightfully English miniature train at Exbury Gardens. The UK has a plethora of narrow gauge and miniature railways like this, beautifully preserved by enthusiasts. 

Disappointed there's no full length trip report? Well, on Wednesday I fly to the United States, and you can look forward to videos on the following:

British Airways 777-200 First Class (x2) 
AA MD80 First Class
AA 777-200 new Business Class 
JetBlue Mint A321
Southwest Airlines 737-700
Delta 717
Amtrak Empire Builder, the whole way, Portland to Chicago

Plus many more. 

www.exbury.co.uk
